entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:22 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 8:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 27 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -20.1°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over southern sections. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over southern sections in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
